content: I like the idea of making gratitude journaling a ritual and treating it as a special time for myself. I've been feeling overwhelmed lately, and I think this could really help me shift my focus to the positive things in my life. One thing that's been on my mind lately is how I've been struggling to stay connected with my friends and family since I stopped using social media. Do you have any tips on how to nurture those relationships without relying on social media?
